::DarkMouse::

She looked at Drillbit. "He got mad. I'd hate to see him get angry 
with me." She tried to smile but it hurt too much.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Drillbit::
> 
> Drillbit is surprized to see that Megatron has been striking his
> comrads.
> "Yes, I see. He's surly not a lady's bot."
